description:
Prominent member of the second, co-ed group of Haibane in http://anidb.net/ch26018 [Guri] (who live at the http://anidb.net/ch26012 [Abandoned Factory] "nest"). Was a friend of http://anidb.net/ch9899 [Reki] in the past.
His name Hyouko probably is written "雹湖" in kanji (with "雹" = "hyou" = "hail", i. e. falling ice balls, and "湖" = "ko" = "lake") as he explains during episode 7 when Rakka mistakes his name for "hiyoko" ("雛" = "chicken", not exactly the way a rough young male likes to be addressed).
Five years ago Hyouko tried to help Reki climb over the wall of the town of Guri; he fell down a ladder in the process and was severely injured. Both he and Reki were enjoined from visiting the other`s nest because of this incident.
name: Hyouko
